enWisdom: Gratitude is the fortress of blessings
Gratitude is the embellishment of comfort and the fortification of blessing

Wisdom: اشْكُرْ مَنْ أَنْعَمَ عَلَيْكَ وَأَنْعِمْ عَلَى مَنْ شَكَرَكَ فَإِنَّهُ لَا زَوَالَ لِلنِّعْمَةِ إِذَا شَكَرْتَ وَلَا بَقَاءَ لَهَا إِذَا كَفَرْتَ
enWisdom: Be grateful to the one who favours you and favour the one who is grateful to you, for indeed there is no end to favours when they are appreciated and there is no continuation for them when they are unappreciated

Wisdom: أَبْلَغُ مَا تُسْتَمَدُّ بِهِ النِّعْمَةُ الشُّكْرُ وَأَعْظَمُ مَا تُمَحَّصُ بِهِ الْمِحْنَةُ الصَّبْرُ
enWisdom: The most effective thing that makes a blessing last longer is gratitude and the greatest thing by which tribulations are overcome is patience

Wisdom: شُكْرُ نِعْمَةٍ سَالِفَةٍ يَقْضِي [يفضي‏] بِتَجَدُّدِ نِعَمٍ مُسْتَأْنِفَةٍ
enWisdom: Gratitude for a past blessing results in the coming of renewed blessings

Wisdom: لَنْ يَقْدِرَ أَحَدٌ أَنْ يُحَصِّنَ النِّعَمَ بِمِثْلِ شُكْرِهَا
enWisdom: None is capable of fortifying blessings the way [showing] gratitude for them does

Wisdom: يَا ابْنَ آدَمَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ يُتَابِعُ عَلَيْكَ نِعَمَهُ فَاحْذَرْهُ وَحَصِّنِ النِّعَمَ بِشُكْرِهَا
enWisdom: Son of Adam, when you see Allah, the Glorified, continuously sending you His blessings then beware of Him, and secure the blessings by being grateful for them
